argument.name: XPos
argument.description: The horizontal coordinate of the last point of the polygon.

argument.name: YPos
argument.description: The vertical coordinate of the last point of the polygon.

page.description: Finish and draw the inside of a polygon.
page.discussion: The INNER_POLY() function completes and draws a polygon. There is no border. The fill color is the current brush color. Compare to the POLY()and FILL_POLY()functions. Limitations: Used only in the Code sections of UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), and UI_PRINTER_DRAW().

section.example: ui_bitmap_create("test", 4, 2) ui_bitmap_draw("test",<<%code% inner_Rect(0, 0, 4, 2) set_brush("green") set_pen("black") start_poly(2, .5) lineto(3, 1) lineto(1, 1.5) inner_poly(2, .5) %code%) ui_dlg_box("","{image=test}")
